## RemirrorGetterParams interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RemirrorGetterParams 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getHTML()](./react.remirrorgetterparams.gethtml.md) | Get the current HTML from the latest editor state. |
|  [getJSON()](./react.remirrorgetterparams.getjson.md) | Get the full JSON representation of the state (including the selection information) |
|  [getObjectNode()](./react.remirrorgetterparams.getobjectnode.md) | Get a representation of the editor content as an ObjectNode which can be used to set content for and editor. |
|  [getText(lineBreakDivider)](./react.remirrorgetterparams.gettext.md) | Get the current raw text from the latest editor state. |
